title: Passivation Performance and Mechanism of a Novel Self-Healing Composite Passivator on Pyrite
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00404C, Paper
Weifeng Wu, Mengke Li, Jiang Tian, Feng Li, Yun Liu
Acid mine drainage (AMD) is a harmful effluent from mining activities. Surface passivation technology can prevent AMD production by coating minerals with passivation films. Previous study reported a composite passivator...
